msbt.message: Well, my days on are numbered. It's kinda sad when you think about it.I'll say this much I am NOT looking forward to packing. Right now, though, I'm just gonna try to relax.
I'm gonna be sad to leave behind, but I love adventures!I still gotta stare at a map and figure out where I'm going, but I think this is gonna be good for me!
There's gonna be one less on ! Guess I actually gotta start packingIt's weird to think I'm gonna do this. I mean, not really, but I'm still kinda surprised with myself!
